revised_title: Investigation of Absorption Spectra of Benzene and its Homologues at Different Temperatures and Pressures
tldr: The author investigates the absorption spectra of benzene and its homologues at different temperatures and pressures, discovering that the position of substituted hydrogens influences the number and position of bands in the spectra. The study confirms that the mode of vibration within the benzene nucleus is largely unaffected by side-chain substitution.
